text: Brian Abbas Amidu (born 21 May 1990) is a Zimbabwean footballer who plays as a forward the Zimbabwe national football team. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Black Mambas F.C. players Category:Kaizer Chiefs F.C. players Category:Black Leopards F.C. players Category:CAPS United players Category:El Entag El Harby SC players Category:Arar FC players Category:Zimbabwe Premier Soccer League players Category:South African Premier Division players Category:National First Division players Category:Egyptian Premier League players Category:Saudi Second Division players Category:Zimbabwean footballers Category:Zimbabwe international footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Iraq Category:Expatriate footballers in Egypt Category:Expatriate footballers in Saudi Arabia Category:Zimbabwean expatriate footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Sportspeople from Harare
title: Brian Amidu
